original_solution_mapping.L1: In total Liam has saved ($500/month * 12 months/year) * 2 years = $12,000
original_solution_mapping.L2: When Liam pays his bills, he will have $12,000 - $3,500 = $<<12000-3500=8500>>8,500 left

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4892.
    Returns: the money Liam has left after paying his bills.
    """
    # L1
    saved_per_month = 500 # $500/month
    years_saved = 2 # 2 years
    months_per_year = 12 # WK
    total_saved = (saved_per_month * months_per_year) * years_saved

    # L2
    bills_cost = 3500 # bills cost $3,500
    money_left_after_bills = total_saved - bills_cost

    # FA
    answer = money_left_after_bills
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In total Liam has saved (${saved_per_month}/month * {months_per_year} months/year) * {years_saved} years = ${total_saved}
When Liam pays his bills, he will have ${total_saved} - ${bills_cost} = $<<{total_saved}-{bills_cost}={money_left_after_bills}>>{money_left_after_bills} left

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In total Liam has saved ($500/month * 500 months/year) * 2 years = $500000
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: When Liam pays his bills, he will have $500000 - $3500 = $<<500000-3500=496500>>496500 left

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'saved_per_month' (500) was used instead of 'months_per_year' (12).
